author: Daniel Greene
description:
Grimdark fantasy isn’t just about blood and betrayal—it’s about exploring human nature at its harshest and most honest. From Game of Thrones to The First Law Trilogy, fans are drawn to morally gray characters, brutal worlds, and the question of what people become when hope runs thin.
Between Two Fires Review here: https://youtu.be/vP-q-vOB_8s 
Do you love grimdark fantasy, or do you avoid it? Let’s talk.
